body.name: Microfibre Floor Mop for Cleaning Floors - FORSPEEDER Flat Floor Mop for Laminate Wooden Hard Floor Vinyl Tile, Dust Wet Dry Mop for Kitchen Bathroom Wall Cleaning with 3 Washable Chenille Pads
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 17 hrs 14 mins
features: DUAL USE PROFESSIONAL FLOOR MOP - Dust mop can not only work with the provided chenille microfiber pads(attached by Velcro), it is also compatible with disposable cleaning cloth, wipes, towels, rags and old clothes due to the 4 holes on the flat mop head. You only need to push it into the holes to keep it in place. Specially designed for people who don't like washing mop pads. You can toss away the disposable cloth directly after use. And your old clothes and rags will be fully utilized.

EFFECTIVE CLEANING WITH CHENILLE PADS - Hardwood floor mop comes with 3 high density chenille pads, which has a larger contact area with the floor, so it can trap dust and dirt more effectively. With excellent water absorption, chenille pad will absorb water quickly to prevent your floor soaking wet. Our microfiber mop for hardwood floors is perfect for both dry and wet cleaning. The pad is also machine washable and reusable, you can just throw the pad in the washer after mopping for next use.

UNIVERSAL SIZE MICROFIBER PADS 3 PACK - Our microfiber mop replacement pads measure 15.2x4.8in, compatible with Swiffer PowerMop and most spray mops and floor mops on the market. And please note that our microfiber mop head pads can only work with mop with Velcro design. Great attachment for your mop.

ADJUSTABLE LONG HANDLE FOR COMFORTABLE USE - Wood floor mop handle consists of 4 sections which are easy to put together. It’s long up to 58.5in, so our floor mop is also a good choice for cleaning high areas like window, wall and ceilings, as well as deep areas. And you can adjust the handle to the length you are comfortable with by taking one or two section out. Needn’t bend over while using the dust mop for floor cleaning, which relives your fatigue and back pain and makes cleaning a breeze.

FLEXIBLE SWIVELING FLAT MOP HEAD - The hardwood floor mop head has a flexible swivel joint, which allows the flat mop head to 360 degrees freely rotate to fit every corner. Microfiber floor mop can lay nearly flat to go under the bed, sofa, cabinet and other furniture, and it can also reach crevices and crannies. With our dry mop for hardwood floors, it will be simple and effortless to clean all hard-to-reach areas of your house, ensuring your house is thoroughly cleaned.

MULTIPURPOSE DUST MOP FOR DAILY USE - The microfiber dust floor mop is ideal for cleaning all hard surfaces including hardwood, wood, tile, laminate, vinyl plank flooring, wall, window, ceiling, etc. You can use the vinyl floor mop in your kitchen, bathroom, home, rv, office, school, etc. Our lightweight kitchen mop is very easy to assemble and maneuver, definitely an efficient and helpful cleaning tool for elderly, people with arthritis, and house owner with kids and pets.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: FORSPEEDER professional 2 in 1 floor mop is coming with more powerful function. With higher density, the provided chenille microfiber pad has stronger water absorption and decontamination. And the specially designed 4 holes on the flat mop head allows you to add a different cloth you like. Just push the corners of the cloth into the holes to keep it in place. You can use the disposable cloth for dry mopping and just throw it into trash after use, and you can also use your rags, towels or old clothing, saving money and environment. Provided chenille pads will not be your only choice for cleaning work. Just choose way you like! Warm Tips： 1. The suggested minimum size for the disposable cloth is 16x12in. 2. It’s compatible with towels, cleaning rags and old clothes as well, and thin cloth will be easier to hold in place. 3. Disposable cloth needs to be wrapped around the chenille pads while using disposable cloth in case of scratching the floor. Come and enjoy a totally different and new experience that FORSPEEDER bring to you!

ABSORBENT CHENILLE PAD Our premium chenille microfiber mop pad is almost twice as dense as the regular ones. The denser filaments increase the contact area with floor, strengthening its ability of absorbing water and trapping dust and dirt. WASHABLE AND REUSABLE The wet dry floor mop pad is hand and machine washable, you can just throw it into the washing machine and air dry for next use. And we also provided with a practical toothed tool for scraping the hair and dirt on the pad. HANGING HOLE DESING The steel handle of the dust mop is 58.5in long and features with a hanging hole at the top of the handle. So you can easily hang it on the wall for storage after use the hardwood mop, which saves more space for you.
Flat floor mop can be used on hardwood, laminate, tile, vinyl plank flooring, wood floor, window, wall, etc.

Floor Mop Microfiber Mop Replacement Pads 3 Pack Microfiber Mop Replacement Pads 4 Pack Microfiber Mop Replacement Pads 5 Pack Spray Mop Number of Pads 3 Pads 3 Pads 4 Pads 5 Pads 3 Pads Color Blue+Grey Blue Blue Blue Blue+Grey Dry/Wet Use ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Application Suitable for cleaning hardwood floor, laminate, tile, vinyl, window, wall, ceiling, etc. Suitable for cleaning all hard floors, compatible with most spray mops and floor mops. Suitable for cleaning all hard floors, compatible with most spray mops and floor mops. Suitable for cleaning all hard floors, compatible with most spray mops and floor mops. Suitable for cleaning all hard floos including hardwood, laminate, tile, vinyl, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is light weight and works just as well (actually better than) as a heavy industrial dust mop! I retired the dust mop at the church in exchange for this one! Oh Yes!!!! It fits under chairs easily, it picks up better than my old one and it proves to be much more convenient and functional. The mop cover just pulls off and then you can wash it and reuse it…..what could be better than that???

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Some of the best money ever spent.
reviews.reviewText: Some of the best money ever spent. Anything that makes cleaning less hassle and go faster it’s awesome. It gets under cupboards encounters .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is not very heavy. Easy to use. Love it for my walls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The product does what is designed to do for the money paid. It absorbs contained spills on hard surfaces. The plastic connector rings on the handle are already breaking down after 9 months of usage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mop is fantastic! Super convenient. Easy to clean. Easy to store. The chaniel mop head gets in all the little nooks and crannies of my flooring and cleans it spic and span. With my three corgis it’s exactly what I need to keep the floors super clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this mop. It made my sweeping job so much quicker and cleaner. The best part is it comes with 2 extra pads.No complaints from me. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great design BUT mop stick broke first time use
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I loved the simple design of this mop, the very reasonable price, as well as the ability to attach other mopping pads/reusable cleaning cloths. Was also extremely easy to put together and the microfiber pads that were included were very good quality as well. Unfortunately within five minutes of mopping my floors, the metal mopping stick (handle) completely bent to the point where I cannot use it again. If the stick was made of a stronger material this would really be an ideal cleaning tool for this price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m glad I didn’t believe the negative reviews! This item was easy to put together and sturdy. It makes me wonder if changes were made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great mop, easy to use and slim enough to store away. It seems to collect dust and dirt well. I use it on my laminate floor, with method floor cleaner. I love that it has washable pads too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: PROS- easy to use, quick set up, adjustable, simple stick on stick off pads, pads wash well also.CONS- it has a handle gripper on part of the pole which doesn't stay on very well when using, luckily you can just remove it.3 pads, 1 mop head and 4 sections of pole to connect together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: What can you say about a mop, not a great deal so all I can say that it’s very good at what it does, easy to assemble and you get three mop heads which appear to be of good quality, provided you wash them in the correct temperature. Worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 1, 2024
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this mop sweep to apply Lemon oil to my oak flooring. I have 2 other mop sweeps an old one (retired now )as the fabric started to become unravelled and was very difficult to get it clean, and a cotton industrial one, very good for dry seeeping but fronds too long for wet mopping or oil application. This new mop sweep is perfect for damp dry sweeping or damp mopping. The microfibres are short and won’t pull and unravel, they are easy to clean , either wet or dry. The pads attach/ detach easily and are are machine washable. The pad I use for oil application is kept in a bag and not washed’ daily.The swivel joint on the plate/ handle attachment is easily manoeuvred making getting under / around furniture a breeze.My only gripe is the collapsible handle feels a little flimsy and wobbles a wee bit during use, my other mop seeeps have sturdier handles.But that being said it’s a great product.
